Package baseblocksystem

Class servletBase

java.lang.Object
javax.servlet.GenericServlet
javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
baseblocksystem.servletBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProjectController, SessionController, StatisticController, TimeReportController, UserController
public abstract class servletBase
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
Abstract base with common logic for controller
Since:
2020-03-14
Version:
0.1
Author:
Jesper Annefors, Oliver Ekberg
See Also:

      Returns:
      true if the user is logged in, otherwise false.

      Sets sets logged in in the session using given boolean.
      Parameters:
      request - The HTTP Servlet request (so that the session can be found)
      loggedIn - whether to set the session to logged in or logged out.

      projectId - unique identifier of the project to check.
      Returns:
      whether user is project leader or not.
